subSubSection.paragraph: Upper rio Parana , rio Sao Francisco, rio Itapicuru, rio Paraiba do Sul, and rio Itapemirim basins: Brazil and Paraguay.

Piabina argentea
is diagnosed by having longitudinal dark band in the lateral of the body; dark spot in caudal peduncle absent; 18-21 rays in anal fin.
